title: Just In Case - Secure Access to Critical Information
hero.disclaimer: This is not a legal will, just an automatic message delivery system
hero.heading: Secure access to critical information
hero.subheading: Automatic message delivery system in case of death, accident or disappearance. Transfer passwords, documents and final wishes to selected people – safely and automatically.
how_it_works.title: How does it work?
how_it_works.description: Automated way to pass critical information to your loved ones in case of unforeseen situations
how_it_works.step1_description: Write a message, add attachments (up to 10MB) and select recipients. Set a time interval after which the message will be sent (e.g. 90 days).
how_it_works.step2_description: Confirm with one click that everything is fine. The system will send a reminder before the timer expires, giving you time to react.
how_it_works.step3_description: If you stop resetting the timer, the system will automatically send an encrypted message with attachments to selected recipients.
how_it_works.step4_description: Setup takes less than 5 minutes. Create a free account and secure your information today.
problem_solution.title: The problem we solve
problem_solution.description: In case of death, accident or disappearance, loved ones often do not have access to critical information
problem_solution.automatic_description: The system works without your intervention
for_whom.title: Who is Just In Case for?
for_whom.description: Perfect for anyone who wants to secure access to important information for their loved ones – from freelancers with digital assets to parents caring for their family's future.
pricing.title: Start for free
pricing.description: Free plan with all key features
pricing.feature_attachments: Up to 10MB attachments per trust
pricing.feature_recipients: Up to 2 recipients per trust
final_cta.title: Ready to secure your information?
final_cta.description: Join people who have taken care of their loved ones' future. Setup takes less than 5 minutes.
